Reference

All functions

cyphr

High Level Encryption Wrappers

data_admin_init() data_admin_authorise() data_admin_list_requests() data_admin_list_keys()

Encrypted data administration

data_request_access() data_key()

User commands

encrypt() decrypt() encrypt_() decrypt_()

Easy encryption and decryption

encrypt_data() encrypt_object() encrypt_string() encrypt_file() decrypt_data() decrypt_object() decrypt_string() decrypt_file()

Encrypt and decrypt data and other things

key_openssl()

Symmetric encryption with openssl

key_sodium()

Symmetric encryption with sodium

keypair_openssl()

Asymmetric encryption with openssl

keypair_sodium()

Asymmetric encryption with sodium

rewrite_register()

Register functions to work with encrypt/decrypt

session_key_refresh()

Refresh the session key

ssh_keygen()

Create ssh keypairs
